channel.title: The IRC - EDIT: Now follows forum rules?
channel.description:
EDIT -
The rules changed since I was last in there. It used to be that there were a set of rules for the IRC (mostly pertaining to bots), and the forum rules did not apply.
So the brawls that go on the IRC do not count as meriting any punishment, but having fun with another member, not causing any harm to anyone (there was no one even active in the chat besides him and I, so it's not like I was interrupting a conversation) deserves a multiple week ban.
I don't see how I caused any harm, but I guess rules are rules.
Mod can lock/remove thread

item.title: The IRC - EDIT: Now follows forum rules?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:41, topic:364654”][quote author=Lin link=topic=460861.msg3371948#msg3371948 date=1287294964]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=460861.msg3371929#msg3371929 date=1287292918]

[quote author=krackkid link=topic=460861.msg3371928#msg3371928 date=1287292869]

[quote author=John459 link=topic=460861.msg3371921#msg3371921 date=1287292445]

[quote author=krackkid link=topic=460861.msg3371920#msg3371920 date=1287292302]

Yeah the moderation has changed a lot, I remember when I got punished for trolling.

Or my ban for spamming way back when.

lol at least your funny when you troll (usually)
[/quote]Its good to have a fan.

Maybe he was trolling? :eek:
[/quote]Nah he is my friend xD
And change troll to Moparscaper.
[/quote]“dude stop moparscapering”
“dude you’re such a moparscaper”
Idk…
[/quote]Since when do you call someone a trollr/troller?
[/quote]first one would be trolling
second one would be ‘you’re such a troll’
Because he said replace troll with moparscaper[/quote]Oh, I thought he said “moparscape” and I didn’t read “moparscapering”, so you win.

Read full topic

item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

O.o I only been here in Holiday for like 1 year I lived in clearwater 2years then I moved Palm Harbor then I moved to Holiday and I plan to move again.(Also I plan to live Florida when I get older I hate this fucking state.)

Also this forum from since I joined been the same.

item.source: The IRC - EDIT: Now follows forum rules?

item.title: The IRC - EDIT: Now follows forum rules?
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

krackkid:

You cry about moparscape and still use it o.o

I don’t “cry” about anything.

Everything I’ve ever said about this site has been from experience. I’m not new to RS Cheating, and I’ve seen many forums follow the path of this one and die. This really is the last relic of kaits, and I’d prefer not to see it go.

Though I do forget that your some mornic hick from New Port Richy. I shouldn’t even waste my time with some idiot that probably won’t leave the shittiest part of Florida for the rest of his life.

Read full topic
item.source: The IRC - EDIT: Now follows forum rules?

Quit crying if you don’t like IRC than don’t use it.

Simple.
[/quote]You cry about moparscape and still use it o.o[/quote]Owned.

Also - I think that the IRC rules should be listed somewhere. Or at least state where they differ from the forum rules.

item.source: The IRC - EDIT: Now follows forum rules?

item.title: The IRC - EDIT: Now follows forum rules?
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:21, topic:364654”][quote author=Tico link=topic=460861.msg3371849#msg3371849 date=1287289221]
Just so everyone is aware, on the IRC we have and will never ban anyone for “being an idiot.” IRC OP’s are not there to hold a democratic vote on whether or not they should ban someone, they ultimately hold the power to make the necessary decision depending on the situation. Basically, I don’t want to see anyone trying to convince an OP that someone is an “idiot” or “retarded” and that they should ban them. Mental capacity has never and will never restrict a members ability to use the IRC channel.
[/quote]Actually it has. I can recall a few times where Super has banned me for “being an idiot”. Make better op choices :)[/quote]

In instances like these, get ahold of another IRC op and hopefully they will have it dealt with. We do have an IRC Op’s section so we can discuss problems like these that may arise. Alot of us are busy, and alot of us are usually idle, so if you have logs, please send them to us and it will be dealt with accordingly. We can’t deal with what we don’t see happen.

Read full topic
item.source: The IRC - EDIT: Now follows forum rules?

Basically, I don’t want to see anyone trying to convince an OP that someone is an “idiot” or “retarded” and that they should ban them. Mental capacity has never and will never restrict a members ability to use the IRC channel.[/quote]
